ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: There was a poll on Everlore, I believe, and only 6% of the player base has a character between 45-50.  Some attention has to be given to high level folks, but
ygData.messageBody:
There was a poll on Everlore, I believe, and only 6% of the player base has
a character between 45-50. Some attention has to be given to high level
folks, but if that poll is accurate, they make up such a small portion of
the population that they shouldn't get ALL the attention.

> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
> Yah but why should I be forced to play my shaman? I love my necro and I
love
> my shaman but they have some serious problems with high levels and there
is
> no way they should concentrate on low level stuff if the high levels have
> bigger problems.
>
> Naeeldar
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 <g4mntofcr@...>
> To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Date: Monday, January 24, 2000 4:16 PM
> Subject: [eqbards] PoA bard quests plus a rant
>
>
> >From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
> >
> >Are you having fun playing your 21st shaman? If so then you (jackal) have
> >plenty of things to do to keep you occupied until the expansion comes
out.
> >Your shaman still has to suffer from all the problems with the game that
> IMO
> >need to get fixed. If you don't have fun playing anything but your 50
> necro
> >then thats a different story.
> >
> >Galtin of E'ci
> >
> >> I know but then again us 50's played with less then you have now you
guys
> >> just want some new stuff I just need a place to hunt and I've got a 21
> >> shaman right now. There is plenty of places to hunt and there are
quests
> >> here and there but the bottom line is you guys can play it's getting
to
> >> be
> >> unplayable now to wherem ost people don't pla ytheir main chars at all
or
> >> rarely rather because of overcrowding. This is the problem I am forced
to
> >> play my mid level chars so there must be something right for you guys.
> >>
